block.para: Shine a light vertically onto the line L. The shadow of \Vect{x} is the projection of \Vect{x} onto L. Crucial properties of this projection are:

li.para: \pr_{L}(\Vect{x}) is parallel to the direction vector \Vect{y} of L.
The difference vector \Vect{u}:= \Vect{x} - \pr_L(\Vect{x}) is perpendicular to L and to \Vect{y}.
